#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
 
int main() {
    long long int n,med;
    cin>>n;
    long long int a[n];
    int i=0;
    while(i!=n)
    {
        cin>>a[i];
        i++;
    }
    if(n%2==0)
    med=(n/2)-1;
    else
    med=n/2;
    sort(a,a+n);
    cout<<a[med]<<endl;
    return 0;
}
